WorkloadUnit.name: WorkloadUnit
WorkloadUnit.description: Represents the number of work items and average handle time in a specific time interval.

AverageHandleTime.description: The average handle time at a specific period of time.

CustomWorkType.description: The derived field of WorkDemographic.CustomWorkType for the custom dimension value.

DateTime.description: The timestamp of the single data point in the time series of the workload.

IsOmni.description: Derived from isOmni field in workload. Indicates that the workload is Omni-based

MeasureUnit.description: The time interval (in minutes) used in the workload.

Region.description: The derived field from WorkDemographic.Region for the region value.

SkillSet.description: The derived field from WorkDemographic.SkillSet for the skill value.

TotalCount.description: The total number work items at a specific period of time.

WorkDemographicId.description: The foreign key to the WorkDemographic object.

WorkloadId.description: The foreign key to the Workload object.

WorkloadType.description: The derived field from Workload.WorkloadType to indicate the type of workload, for example, a history or forecast workload.
